paytp.not-enough: You don't have enough %s! The teleportation fee is %s %s but you only have %s.
paytp.requester-not-enough: The other player does not have enough money to teleport.
paytp.no-home: You have not set a home yet.
paytp.set-home: Successfully set your current location as your %s!
paytp.create-warp: A new waypoint %s has been created by player %s!
paytp.create-warp-failed: Failed to create waypoint %s. Please make sure you are within an unlinked active beacon beam!
paytp.delete-warp: Waypoint %s has been deleted by player %s!
paytp.empty-warp: There are currently no available waypoints.
paytp.receive:
Player %s wants %s... The request will expire in %s seconds.
Please select:
paytp.request.cancel.sender: Your request to %s has been canceled.
paytp.tp-back: %s returned to the previous teleport point!
paytp.no-back: No teleport point to return to!
paytp.hover.command: click to suggest the %s command in the chat input
paytp.help.title: ================ PayTp Command Guide ================
paytp.help.intro: FYI: Below are all commands provided by this mod. <> denotes required parameters, () denotes optional parameters.
paytp.help.tp.coord.desc: Teleport to specific coordinates (in specific dimension)
paytp.help.tp.back.desc: Return to your previous teleport point
paytp.help.req.to.desc: Request to teleport to the target player
paytp.help.req.here.desc: Request the target player to teleport to your location
paytp.help.req.accept.desc: Accept the most recent teleport request (optionally from a specified player)
paytp.help.req.deny.desc: Deny the most recent teleport request (optionally from a specified player)
paytp.help.req.cancel.desc: Cancel the most recent teleport request you sent (optionally to a specified player)
paytp.help.home.goto.desc: Teleport back to your set home
paytp.help.home.set.desc: Set your current location as home
paytp.help.warp.create.desc: Create a new waypoint (must be within an active beacon beam)
paytp.help.warp.list.desc: View all waypoints on the server
paytp.help.note: Note: All teleports will cost currency based on distance and dimension.
paytp.config.title: PayTp Configuration
paytp.config.title.warning:
⚙ For all command names, you can disable them by setting them to an empty string.
⚠ You need to relaunch your world to get all settings reloaded!
paytp.config.general.mainCommand.tooltip: Set the coordinate teleport command name of the mod
Price multiplier when teleporting across dimensions
paytp.config.request.requestCommand.toCo: Command to request teleporting to the target player
paytp.config.request.requestCommand.here: Command to request the target player to teleport to your location
paytp.config.request.requestCommand.acce: Command used to accept another player's teleport request
paytp.config.request.requestCommand.deny: Command used to deny another player's teleport request
paytp.config.request.requestCommand.canc: Command used to cancel your own teleport request
paytp.config.request.expireTime.tooltip: How many seconds before a teleport request automatically expires
paytp.config.warp.warpCommand.tooltip: Command name to teleport to a waypoint
paytp.config.warp.maxInactiveTicks.toolt: The cooldown time before a waypoint is deleted after its associated beacon is deactivated
paytp.config.warp.checkPeriodTicks.toolt: The interval for checking waypoint-to-beacon matching
paytp.config.warp.warpMultiplier.tooltip: The price multiplier when teleporting to a waypoint
paytp.config.back.backCommand.tooltip: Command name to return to the previous position
paytp.config.back.maxBackStack.tooltip: Maximum number of previous teleport locations saved for back tracking
paytp.config.back.backMultiplier.tooltip: Price multiplier when teleporting back to the previous location
paytp.config.price.currencyItem.tooltip: Item ID used for teleport payment (e.g., minecraft:diamond)
Distance range for minimum price; beyond this, price increases gradually
paytp.config.price.parameter.rate.toolti: Price increase per block beyond the base radius
paytp.config.setting.flag.allowEnderChes: Allow using Ender Chest for teleport payment
paytp.config.setting.flag.prioritizeEnde: If enabled, prioritize taking payment from Ender Chest
paytp.config.setting.flag.allowShulkerBo: Allow using Shulker Box for teleport payment
paytp.config.setting.flag.prioritizeShul: If enabled, prioritize taking payment from Shulker Box
